item.title: CVE-2024-34817|2024-06-04T17:42:31.758Z -- crm%20perks -- integration%20for%20pipedrive%20and%20contact%20form%207%2C%20wpforms%2C%20elementor%2C%20ninja%20forms
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in CRM Perks Integration for Pipedrive and Contact Form 7, WPForms, Elementor, Ninja Forms.This issue affects Integration for Pipedrive and Contact Form 7, WPForms, Elementor, Ninja Forms: from n/a through 1.2.0.
